inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiology grade I-III
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Clinical history or electrocardiographic evidence of heart block, ischaemic - heart disease, asthma, sleep apnoea syndrome
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Impaired liver (preoperative serum albumin level less than 30g/L ) or renal function
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Alcohol consumption in excess of 28 units per week
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Chronic sedative use, and regular use of or known allergy to dexmedetomidine, propofol and opioids.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has abdominal pain lasting about 4 days accompanied by nausea and 2 episodes of vomiting. She has several gallstones and biliary sludge.
